name: Walm's Hatchery
description:
Walm's Hatchery

Located in a cozy underground laboratory, our friend Walm hatches dragons for a living: fiery ones, flying ones - and in a range of different flavourscolors too!  Play as Walm, as you navigate his inconveniently-layed-out lab, adjusting the egg incubation parameters so that you can hatch just the right dragon for his client.

Walm's Hatchery is a chill pizzadragon-making 2D platformer made over the course of nine days by Aero and wilm0x42 for the Godot Wild Jam #28.

Programming & Game design by Aero
Art & Sound by wilm0x42

Although a web build is available, we highly recommend downloading a native executable for the superiormost stable experience.

Known Bugs
  • In HTML builds, sometimes the first level counts a correct hatch as incorrect for unknown reasons.
